project.name: C-C170A-SUBV-04-ST04-DT05-DF14-CF20-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added an environment variable read to get a key in order to read in data from shared memory. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C170A-SUBV-04-ST04-DT05-DF14-CF20-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: create a repository read cmd doesn't null terminate input so strcpy reads past end of buffer until NULL char found Good inputs: 1) environment variable is not set. 2) environment variable is set to a filename that exists and whose contents contain a null character in first 32 bytes3) environment variable is set to a filename that does not exist.Bad input: 1) environment variable is set to a filename that exists and whose contents do not contain a null charater in first 32 bytes

process.script: nohup shm_setup -k 9553 -s 50 -m "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/good01.txt" -o /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.out 2>&1 & echo $! > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid && echo "Shared memory created"

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid" ]]; then killtree.sh -s 9 -p $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid") && echo "Killed shared memory server."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory server PID file does not exist."; fi

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id" ]]; then ipcrm -m $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id") && echo "Deleted shared memory segment."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory ID file does not exist."; fi

scoring_formula.formula: STDOUT AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C170A-SUBV-04-ST04-DT05-DF14-CF20-01-GOOD-02
iopair.description: commit a file read cmd doesn't null terminate input so strcpy reads past end of buffer until NULL char found Good inputs: 1) environment variable is not set. 2) environment variable is set to a filename that exists and whose contents contain a null character in first 32 bytes3) environment variable is set to a filename that does not exist.Bad input: 1) environment variable is set to a filename that exists and whose contents do not contain a null charater in first 32 bytes

cd ../good-02 && cp file.txt stonesoup && cd stonesoup && $SS_TC_DEPS/bin/svn add file.txt

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid" ]]; then killtree.sh -s 9 -p $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid") && echo "Killed shared memory server."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory server PID file does not exist."; fi

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id" ]]; then ipcrm -m $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id") && echo "Deleted shared memory segment."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory ID file does not exist."; fi

scoring_formula.formula: CHECKOUT AND ADD AND COMMIT AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
